name: AF2011A1 magazine
description: Two magazines attached to a common base.  Unique to the AF2011A1.

name: M1991A1 .38 Super magazine
description: A 9-round magazine for the M1991A1 .38 Super pistol.

name: Saiga-410 box magazine
description: A removable plastic magazine for the Saiga-410 shotgun.  Holds 10 rounds of .410 bore shotshells.

name: Saiga-410 drum magazine
description: A removable plastic magazine for the Saiga-410 shotgun.  Holds 30 rounds of .410 bore shotshells.

name: .357 Magnum speedloader
description: This speedloader can hold 7 rounds of .357 Magnum and quickly reload a compatible revolver.

name: .38 Special speedloader
description: This speedloader can hold 6 rounds of .38 Special and quickly reload a compatible revolver.
